ygData.subject: Re: Assist Command?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I found that the quickest way to /assist someone in your party was to use the F keys that are already setup for targetting party members. Actually i
ygData.messageBody:
>From: Steve Fogle <steve.fogle@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: "'eqbards@onelist.com'" <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Assist Command?
>Date: Wed, 2 Jun 1999 14:57:16 -0500
>
>From: Steve Fogle <steve.fogle@...>
>
>Type /assist char_name and you will target whatever mod that char is
>fighting. You will also go into auto attack mode.
>
>Later,
> Steve
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Mott, Mike J. [mailto:MIKE.J.MOTT@...]
>Sent: Wednesday, June 02, 1999 2:33 PM
>To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
>Subject: [eqbards] Assist Command?
>
>
>From: "Mott, Mike J." <MIKE.J.MOTT@...>
>
>The ASSIST command? Am I missing something here? I have never heard of
>this.
>
>--------------
>
>Lullaby can be very useful if you have a rogue and healer in your group and
>fighting multiple mobs. While you sleep the rest of the mobs, the rogue
>can
>
>backstab the one you are fighting and the cleric can heal you. But I
>usually don't use lullaby unless there is a healer in the group and
>everyone
>
>in the group knows what the ASSIST command is for.
>
>
>Lago Bardoon, 21st Rank Bard of Bertox
>

I found that the quickest way to /assist someone in your party was to use
the F keys that are already setup for targetting party members. Actually i
modified mine. The default config is F2 for the first party member in your
list all the way down to F6 for the last. I changed this to F1 thru F5 for
party members, just easier for me to remember. I hit the F key for whoever i
want to assist and quickly type "/ASS" which is the short version of
"/ASSIST" =)

No need to type out "/ASSIST JOEBLOW", takes too long, especially if the guy
has a funky long name and you need to get in the fight quickly. /ASS works
as long as you got a player targetted. Well, it usually works...the assist
command can be touchy sometimes.

I hope this helps!

Sartori D'Elsiraad
Bard of Kelethin of the 15th Chorus
Veeshan
